item.title: Mathame Videos
item.description:
Mathame performance at Dprtmnt Toronto
You can watch the clips on my IG highlights or YouTube
https://www.instagram.com/s/aGlnaGxpZ2h0OjE4MTc0NzI2OTU1MzUzNjkz?story_media_id=3725694139498401825_70144875945&igsh=MXdwZjh3dnBnc3NmZQ==
https://youtu.be/4JprwVu66is?si=45SomAvyQPqk9ya8
I asked them to play their Sonique Sky remix and I went full feral.
Got to banter a bit with them in private and got my singles, EP and album signed.
No visuals or neo statue so we gave the crowd the Terminator instead.
--- Top comment: YouTube maybe blocking the video due to copyright (trying to fix it) but IG definitely works

item.title: Toronto Sep 23 - KFC MC, Tricky Youth, Dicqbeats, nwodtlem - early show
item.description: digital hardcore, idm, noisy, post-modern, future bass, noisecore, future hip-hop, weirdcore, gabba, punk call it whatever you want, but on Tues Sept 23, we're throwing an early jam with music makers that are pushing boundaries. three acts from the States, plus local audio visual fave nwodtlem! it's gonna be wild! pwyc or donate in advance here to secure entry. limited capacity space.Â [more info and links here!](https://embryon.square.site/product/dicqbeats-kfc-murder-chicks-nwodtlem-toronto-sept2025/7VRPI3H5PQSGXV2RBE3VDZ5P) [more Dicqbeats](https://dicqbeats.bandcamp.com/)[more KFC MC](https://kfcmurderchicks.bandcamp.com/)[more Tricky Youth](https://trickyyouth.bandcamp.com/)
